mapper.select: select `userId`,`username`,`avatar` from (select * from `userLike` natural join `User`) as t where `fansId`=1;
mapper.update: update `User` set `fansNum`= case when `fansNum`=0 then `fansNum`=0 else `fansNum`-1 end where `userId`=#{userId};
mapper.select: select blogInfo.blogId,blogInfo.blogTitle,blogInfo.userId from blogCollect, blogInfo where blogCollect.blogId=blogInfo.blogId and blogCollect.userId=#{userId};
